Summary: Orange/yellow/white fireball with tail was noticed in Natrona Heights, PA
divs: sighting detailsi was playing outside with siblings and cousins in the front yard of our natrona heights, pa home. it was a warm summer night with clear skies. as a youngster i was always intrigued with ufos, aliens, and the like. having a tendency to gaze into the nighttime skies, it was easy for me to notice the ufo as 9 year-old child. when i first noticed the object, it looked like an enormous comet. it was a bright orangish\white\yellow color with a tail. however, i knew it was much too big to be a comet. it really resembled a comet in the sense that the "head" of the fireball was at the bottom, and the "tail" was pointed "up" at about a 45 degree angle. the strangest thing was that the ufo was not traveling "downward" towards the horizon but was traveling "up" with the tail leading the way forward! i was so excited that i told my siblings\cousins who were outside with me, but they really didn't seem as interested as i was. i ran frantically into the house to get my parents so they could see it and photograph it. they were busy entertaining my relatives and really didn't believe me as i hysterically tried to convince them that there was a ufo outside. unfortunately i clearly remember the helpless feeling and frustration that overcame me as i realized that they either did not believe me or just didn't want to be bothered. when i returned outside the object was gone. i have not seen a ufo since then. i have estimated the date and time of the sighting to be either 1983\1984 summer and it was about 9:30pm.
